CatDescriptText: Related images published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 8, 1941, pg. 10, reads: "Leading Figures in Repeat Performance of 'Aida' - Leading figures in repeat performance of 'Aida,' in Syria Mosque last Thursday evening. It was another artistic success..."
TitMainTitle: Chorus in Egyptian costume, standing on stage in Syria Mosque during dress rehearsal for National Negro Opera Company performance of "Aida"
